1.0.name: wordpress/sf-archiver
1.0.description:
This plugin adds a box to your Menus admin page. With this you can add in your menus a link to your public custom post types (their archive page).

If a custom post type doesn't have an archive page, you can enable it by going to Settings > SF Archiver. You can also change the slugs in the url, create an RSS feed link, customize the number of posts per page, or even add your custom post types to your home page.

Translations

  • English
  • French
